SELECT /*+ FIRST_ROWS($pageSize$) */ O.ORDER_ID, R.NAME AS RESTAURANT_NAME FROM FTGO_PLACED_ORDER O, FTGO_RESTAURANT R WHERE O.RESTAURANT_ID = R.RESTAURANT_ID
AND r.name = #criteria.restaurantName#
AND o.delivery_city = #criteria.deliveryCity#
AND o.status = #criteria.state#
ORDER BY o.ORDER_ID ASC

SELECT * FROM (
